title: Bucks-Raptors, Klay Thompson, and LeBron James
itunes:title: Bucks-Raptors, Klay Thompson, and LeBron James
description:
Colin discusses game 5 of the Eastern Conference Finals, Golden State Warriors G Klay Thompson losing millions, and Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James recruiting players. Guests include Chris Broussard, Matt Barnes, Rob Parker, and Jason McIntyre. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
